name: BourBon
description: Double-layered chocolate cream biscuits – crunchy outside, creamy inside. Perfect late-night munch.

name: Nice Time
description: Light, crispy coconut-flavored biscuits with sugar crystals on top. Sweet and simple, ekdum mood fresh.

name: Coffee
description: Quick-fix strong coffee sachet – bas garam paani daalo aur jag jao. Budget-friendly caffeine boost.
